Author: JuBelen
Text: I have some problems with that, too. I lost 30kg in 2017, but I never noticed any changes. I still se myself the same way. I have some pictures from that time, I look at them and see the same body I have now (which is not possible because I can't wear my old clothes anymore).  I have one picture a classmate took of me a few weeks ago and my legs look slim, and I can't stop looking at it. In that picture I am what I want to be, but I can't see myself like that nowhere else.
